resources.string: Your account is inactive. Please activate your account in order to continue using Full AdShield.
This does not seem to be a valid active account. If you believe this is a mistake, please contact us by tapping the help icon at the top.
Could not create a new account. Please try again later.
This action could not be completed. Make sure you are online, and try again later. If the problem persists, please contact us by tapping the help icon at the top.
Could not establish the VPN. Please restart your device, or remove Full AdShield VPN profile in system settings, and try again.
Could not establish the VPN. Please restart your device, or remove Full AdShield VPN profile in system settings, and try again.
No permissions granted to create a VPN profile.
You reached your devices limit. Please remove one of your devices and try again.
The VPN is disabled. Please update your subscription to continue using Full AdShield
Your previous payment was restored, but the subscription has already expired. If you believe this is a mistake, please contact us by tapping the help icon at the top.
Payments are unavailable at this moment. Make sure you are online, and try again later. If the problem persists, please contact us by tapping the help icon at the top.
Could not complete your payment. Please make sure your data is correct, and try again. If the problem persists, please contact us by tapping the help icon at the top.
Payments are unavailable for this device. Either Apple Pay is not activated, or we do not handle purchases in your country yet.
The payment has been canceled. You have not been charged.
Could not install (or uninstall) this feature. Please try again later.
An unknown problem occurred. Please try again. If the problem persists, please contact us by tapping the help icon at the top.
Full AdShield DNS is currently supported only in Plus mode. Please choose another DNS and try again.
Please restart the app for the changes to take effect.
Continue with the Full AdShield App
Are you sure you want to proceed?
For security reasons, to download a file, we need to open this website in your browser. Then, please tap the download link again.
Please update your subscription to continue using Full AdShield
Swipe the notification left or right for settings.
Full AdShield %s is now available for download. We recommend keeping the app up to date, and downloading it only from our official sources.
You are now using the newest version of Full AdShield! Remember, donating or subscribing to Full AdShield Plus allows us to continue improving the app.
The update is now downloading, and you should see the installation prompt shortly.
To improve privacy, Full AdShield uses a VPN Configuration to forward some requests to DNS. You will be asked to allow it in the next step.
Full AdShield for iOS helped me block %s ads and trackers!
How do you like Full AdShield so far?
Would you help us by rating Full AdShield on App Store?
ads and trackers forwarded since installation
What would you like to do?
Choose apps that should never be forwarded
Adjust your encryption level and DNS
Advanced features will be developed soon. Sit tight, we are improving the AdShield experience for you!
This request used main DNS, because it is on your Allowed list
This request used alter DNS, because it is on your Forwarded list
Which entries would you like to see?
Try using your device, and come back here later, to see where your device connects to.
Adjust settings for WiFi and mobile networks
Tap here to modify default settings. To make the app behave differently on some networks, tap below.
Tap to modify settings for this network
The settings below are applied by default for all networks. You can override them for selected networks (in the previous screen).
Adjust what should happen when your device connects to this network.
Adjust what should happen when your device connects to a network of this type.
To have more control, tap here and let the app recognise all networks.
You may see a notification when Full AdShield reads your network name in the background.
Full AdShield will encrypt DNS if possible. This improves your security and prevents malicious actors to spy on what websites and apps you use.
Full AdShield will use %s as your device\'s DNS. Choosing the one that allows for encryption (has the lock icon), and is near to you, will help protecting your data and making your connection fast.

Full AdShield will use the network\'s DNS if available, or switch to %s otherwise. Also, the Encrypt DNS settings will be ignored whenever network DNS is used. Using the network\'s DNS helps to fix connectivity problems on troublesome networks, but leaves you unprotected.

Full AdShield will temporarily disable Plus Mode whenever network DNS is used. This is because it is not possible to access network DNS in VPN. The Plus Mode will be automatically restored when your device switches to another network.
Full AdShield will use Full AdShield DNS in Plus mode, to ensure high level of encryption and speed. You may change this setting at the bottom of the Choose DNS screen.
Full AdShield will always use Libre mode on this network, and ignore your Full AdShield Plus location. This is useful for networks where you do not want the additional protection.

Full AdShield can recognize networks you connect to, and let you configure separate settings for them. However, this app will collect location data in the form of network name to enable this feature, even when the app is closed or not in use. Sometimes you may see a system notification about location access - Full AdShield will only read the network\'s name.
Your Full AdShield %s account is active until %s.
Your AdShield account is active until forever.
Enter your account ID to continue

Don\'t worry, if you lost or forgot your account ID, we can recover it. Please contact our support, and provide us information that will allow us to identify your purchase (eg. last 4 digits of your credit card, or PayPal email).
This is your account ID. Write it down and keep it private. It’s the only way to access your subscription.
Your payment method does not allow to control the auto renewal setting here.
Unlock to show your account ID
Please enter another account ID, or go back to keep using your existing account (this app cannot be used without one).
How do I restore my old account?

Domain Name System is how your device knows where to find the websites you want to visit. Unfortunately, most of the Internet still uses unencrypted DNS, which puts your browsing history at risk of being spied on. When enabled, Full AdShield is forcing your device to connect only to encrypted DNS servers (also called DNS over HTTPS).

Your device is connecting through our secure VPN servers, and all communication coming from, or to, your device is being encrypted using strong algorithms. This protects your personal information, like banking details or personal photos, from being stolen in unsecure places, like a coffee shop WiFi.
DNS is how your device knows where to find websites. Full AdShield supports only encrypted servers.
Use Full AdShield DNS in Plus mode
These devices are connected to your account.

Selecting a location here will generate a config file that you can use in any VPN app that supports Wireguard. This is useful for platforms where we don\'t have our apps yet. Otherwise, we recommend using our native apps instead.
Device added! Download the configuration to use it on any device supported by Wireguard.
Full AdShield uses Wireguard. Configurations can be downloaded when creating new devices.
AdShield will now switch into Plus mode, and connect through one of our secure locations. If you are unsure which one to choose, the closest one to you is recommended.
Upgrade to our VPN service to stay in control of *your privacy*.
Hide your IP address and pretend you are in another country. This will mask you from third-parties and help protect your identity.
Data sent through our VPN tunnel is encrypted using strong algorithms in order to protect against interception by unauthorized parties.
Great speeds up to 100Mbps with servers in various parts of the World.
Use the same account to share your subscription with up to 5 devices: iOS, Android, or PC.
Keep using the world famous Full AdShield requests forwarding technology while improving your protection level and keeping your data private.
Get a prompt response to any questions thanks to our Customer Support and vibrant open source community.
We accept Euro, and the displayed prices are an estimate. A refund is available if your bank charges too much.
Your account is now active! You may now use all Full AdShield Plus features on all your devices.
Please wait. This should only take a moment.
Your payment is now being processed.

Credit card payments should not take more than a few minutes. Cryptocurrency payments usually take up to an hour, depending on what transaction fee you chose. In case of PayPal, it may take up to 24 hours. You will get redirected once your account is ready. You may also close this screen, and come again later. If you feel like your transaction is taking too long, please contact us.
To pay with your cryptocurrency wallet, tap the button below.
We are based in Europe, so we accept Euro: €10 is roughly $12.
This won\'t activate your Full AdShield Plus account. If you wish to use our VPN service, please subscribe instead of donating.
Which apps would you like to see?

An active coloured button means that Full AdShield is working.

Mind that some ads and popups can still be visible. However, you will notice a significant difference.

We recommend you activate <u>Always on VPN / Connect on Demand</u> in your system settings.
Learn the basic information about the app.
Download Full AdShield for your platform.
Donate to help us continue the project.
Full AdShield is the popular ad blocker and privacy app for Android and iOS. It\'s being supported and actively developed by the amazing open source community.

If you want to efficiently manage ads, trackers, malware, save on your data plan, speed up your device and protect your privacy with just one application, then Full AdShield is for you. It is free, secure and open source.
Works for all apps and all browsers
Learn more about Full AdShield Plus

For ultimate privacy protection, upgrade to Full AdShield Plus and connect through our VPN. We use WireGuard®, the most advanced VPN protocol, to encrypt your network activity and hide your IP address.
No logging of your network activity
\'WireGuard\' and the \'Wireguard\' logo are registered trademarks of Jason A. Donenfeld.
What information does Full AdShield keep?

Full AdShield does not track or share any of your network activity. If you use Full AdShield Plus, for technical reasons we need to collect the most minimal data required to keep the service operational. Please consult our Privacy Policy available in the top menu for details.

Full AdShield prevents apps and browsers installed on your device from sending your private data (known as tracking fingerprints) to the Internet. It also encrypts some of your network activity (DNS queries). If you need more protection, Full AdShield Plus makes your device connect through our VPN, and uses the WireGuard® protocol to encrypt your entire network traffic.

Full AdShield Plus is our safe and modern VPN (Virtual Private Network) service. It uses WireGuard® - a fast protocol with best-in-class encryption and low battery usage. Full AdShield Plus encrypts all of your network activity in real time, giving you the highest level of protection available. You also get the popular VPN features - hide your IP address, change your location, and unblock geo-restricted content.
Do I need to upgrade to Full AdShield Plus?

No, the upgrade is optional. You may stick to the free version of Full AdShield, forever. It is a recommended upgrade if you wish to increase your privacy protection even more, or need any of the popular features VPNs provide.
What is the Full AdShield Plus refund policy?
You can get your money back within 7-days of purchasing the subscription. Contact us through any of our apps, and simply mention you want a refund.
We are based in Sweden, where privacy is handled very seriously. Our servers are available in many places around the world.
Full AdShield is available for several platforms, choose yours.

Currently, we do not provide Full AdShield for other platforms. However, if you are Full AdShield Plus user, you can use our VPN on Windows, Linux, Mac, and other platforms where Wireguard is available.
Full AdShield 5 is simply available on App Store.
This is our new, recommended version . It is simpler and faster compared to Full AdShield 4.
AdShield is a , and it only contains features allowed by the Google Play policy.
We still maintain the older version of Full AdShield. It has more features, works on older devices, and TVs.

Full AdShield is not only the privacy app. It is also the community of people who care about their digital privacy and wellbeing. You will find us on our forum, where you can ask any questions you may have. We are also present on other social media and chats.
We base all of our work on the feedback of our users. Tell us what you think, what should we improve, or just hang out.
Here are some of the opinions from our users.
If you like what we do, consider supporting us, so that we can continue developing new features and improvements. This way, Full AdShield can stay open source and free forever.
Full AdShield is dependent on you

Full AdShield is an open source project, which means you can be sure it\'s always going to be free, safe to use, and without any hidden agenda. We believe this is the only right way to develop a privacy app you can trust.
However, developing a quality app like Full AdShield requires a considerable amount of resources. This project exists thanks to the support of awesome people like you!
and want to make Full AdShield better?

Full AdShield is an open source project dedicated to developing the best ad blocker and privacy app for Android and iOS. Check our Github, and let us know, if you need any assistance to make your first PR.
Sync with Fulldive and get rewards
Thank you for trying our Full apps, we feature many more great apps such as a browser that rewards you cash when you browse, check it out!
Do you like Fulldive? We would love to hear your feedback and make the app better for you.
Need help? Send us e-mail and we will solve your issue shortly.
